name: Oh, No! Math!
description:
This is my entry for Unity's Create With Code 2 Game Jam, with the theme of 'One Rule.' The player does indeed only need to follow one rule in this game, but it's tougher than it first seems!

This one was pretty challenging to make, I was almost too ambitious with what I wanted to incorporate, but I'm so glad that I muscled through it!

In this game, you exercise your knowledge of multiplication tables by avoiding the targets that can be evenly divided by the floating red Forbidden Multiplier. It's a bit of an edutainment/shooter mashup.

Thanks to Unity for hosting another Game Jam, I'm really enjoying participating in these!
